banner.name: I AM
banner.description: I am a Software Engineering student passionate about programming, with a focus on FrontEnd.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Santiago Chamorro, I'm a Software Engineering student with a passion for learning and helping others with updated skills in the software world. When I'm not immersed in programming the hobbies that stand out the most are sports, like cycling, skating, table tennis, volleyball and other sports.
